trans-unit.source: Don't Move
trans-unit.target: 别动

trans-unit.source: Destroy all tapped creatures. Until your next turn, whenever a creature becomes tapped, destroy it.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有已横置的生物。直到你的下一个回合，每当一个生物成为横置时，将它消灭。

trans-unit.source: "Keep absolutely still. Its vision is based on movement."\n—Alan Grant
trans-unit.target: 「绝对不要动。它只会看见移动的物体。」 ～艾伦·格兰特

trans-unit.source: Cresting Mosasaurus
trans-unit.target: 狂咬沧龙

trans-unit.resname: REX·2 | Cresting Mosasaurus | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Emerge {6}{U} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.)
trans-unit.target: 化生{6}{U}（你可以牺牲一个生物并支付化生费用来施放此咒语，此时总费用会扣除该生物之法术力值。）

trans-unit.resname: REX·2 | Cresting Mosasaurus | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Cresting Mosasaurus enters the battlefield, if you cast it, return each non-Dinosaur creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 当狂咬沧龙进战场时，若它经你施放，则将所有非恐龙生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: It preyed on anything it could sink its teeth into.
trans-unit.target: 它会捕食任何它能咬到的东西。

trans-unit.source: Spitting Dilophosaurus
trans-unit.target: 吐液双冠龙

trans-unit.resname: REX·3 | Spitting Dilophosaurus | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever Spitting Dilophosaurus enters the battlefield or attacks, put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当吐液双冠龙进战场或攻击时，在至多一个目标生物上放置一个-1/-1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: REX·3 | Spitting Dilophosaurus | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Creatures your opponents control with -1/-1 counters on them can't block.
trans-unit.target: 由对手操控且其上有-1/-1指示物的生物不能进行阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "Nice boy . . . nice boy. Nice dinosaur!"
trans-unit.target: 「好孩子…乖孩子。乖恐龙！」

trans-unit.source: Hunting Velociraptor
trans-unit.target: 狩猎迅猛龙

trans-unit.resname: REX·4 | Hunting Velociraptor | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: First strike
trans-unit.target: 先攻

trans-unit.resname: REX·4 | Hunting Velociraptor | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Dinosaur spells you cast have prowl {2}{R}. (You may cast a spell for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a creature with any of its creature types.)
trans-unit.target: 你施放的恐龙咒语具有伺机{2}{R}。（如果你本回合中曾以与伺机咒语有共通生物类别的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害，则你可以支付该咒语的伺机费用来施放之。））

trans-unit.source: "Clever girl."\n—Robert Muldoon
trans-unit.target: 「聪明的女孩。」 ～罗伯特·马尔登

trans-unit.resname: REX·5 | Life Finds a Way | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Life Finds a Way
trans-unit.target: 生命自有出路

trans-unit.resname: REX·5 | Life Finds a Way | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
trans-unit.target: 每当一个力量等于或大于4且非衍生物的生物在你的操控下进战场时，殖民。（派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。）

trans-unit.resname: REX·5 | Life Finds a Way | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Life breaks free. It expands to new territories and crashes through barriers. Painfully, maybe even dangerously. But, uh, well there it is."\n—Ian Malcolm
trans-unit.target: 「生命会挣脱桎梏。它会扩展到新的领土，突破所有障碍。这个过程很辛苦，甚至会很危险。但是，呃，生命就是这样。」 ～伊恩·马科姆

trans-unit.source: Savage Order
trans-unit.target: 捕杀命令

trans-unit.resname: REX·6 | Savage Order | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature with power 4 or greater.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个力量等于或大于4的生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。

trans-unit.resname: REX·6 | Savage Order | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a Dinosaur creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. It gains indestructible until your next turn.
trans-unit.target: 从你牌库中搜寻一张恐龙生物牌，将之放进战场，然后洗牌。它获得不灭异能直到你的下一个回合。

trans-unit.source: "Well... it's a superpredator."\n—Billy Brennan
trans-unit.target: 「嗯…是超级掠食者。」 ～比利·布伦南

trans-unit.source: Welcome to . . .
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到…

trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.) I — For each opponent, up to one target noncreature artifact they control becomes a 0/4 Wall artifact creature with defender for as long as you control this Saga. II — Create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample. It gains haste until end of turn. III — Destroy all Walls. Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。） I — 为每位对手各选择至多一个目标由其操控且非生物的神器。于你操控此传纪的时段内，这些神器成为0/4具守军异能的墙神器生物。 II — 派出一个3/3绿色，具践踏异能的恐龙衍生生物。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。 III — 消灭所有墙。放逐此传纪，然后将它在你的操控下移回战场且已转化。

trans-unit.source: Jurassic Park
trans-unit.target: 侏罗纪公园

trans-unit.source: (Transforms from Welcome to ....) Each Dinosaur card in your graveyard has escape. The escape cost is equal to the card's mana cost plus exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast cards from your graveyard for their escape cost.) {T}: Add {G} for each Dinosaur you control.
trans-unit.target: （由欢迎来到…转化。） 你坟墓场中的每张恐龙牌均具有逸脱异能。其逸脱费用等同于该牌的法术力费用加上从你的坟墓场放逐三张其他牌。（你可以从你的坟墓场施放牌，并支付其逸脱费用。） {T}：你每操控一个恐龙，便加{G}。

trans-unit.resname: REX·8 | Blue, Loyal Raptor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Blue, Loyal Raptor
trans-unit.target: 忠诚迅猛龙布鲁

trans-unit.resname: REX·8 | Blue, Loyal Raptor | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Partner with Owen Grady, Raptor Trainer (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Owen into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
trans-unit.target: 与迅猛龙训练师欧文·格雷迪拍档（当此生物进战场时，目标牌手可以将欧文从其牌库置于其手上，然后洗牌。）

trans-unit.resname: REX·8 | Blue, Loyal Raptor | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: For each kind of counter on Blue, Loyal Raptor, each other Dinosaur you control enters the battlefield with a counter of that kind on it.
trans-unit.target: 每个由你操控的其他恐龙进战场时上面均有若干指示物，其种类与数量为「忠诚迅猛龙布鲁上的每种指示物各一个」。

trans-unit.source: Compy Swarm
trans-unit.target: 美颌龙大群

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, create a tapped token that's a copy of Compy Swarm.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有生物死去，则派出一个已横置的衍生物，此衍生物为美颌龙大群的复制品。

trans-unit.source: "There's no reason for it to fear man."\n—Robert Burke
trans-unit.target: 「它没有道理要怕人类。」 ～罗伯特·伯克

trans-unit.resname: REX·10 | Ellie and Alan, Paleontologists | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ellie and Alan, Paleontologists
trans-unit.target: 古生物学家艾丽与艾伦

trans-unit.resname: REX·10 | Ellie and Alan, Paleontologists | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Discover X, where X is the mana value of the exiled card. Activate only as a sorcery. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with that mana value or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: {T}，从你的坟墓场放逐一张生物牌：倾探X，X为所放逐之牌的法术力值。只能于法术时机起动。（从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张法术力值等于或小于该数值的非地牌为止。施放之且不需支付其法术力费用，或将之置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。）

trans-unit.source: Grim Giganotosaurus
trans-unit.target: 阴森南巨龙

trans-unit.resname: REX·11 | Grim Giganotosaurus | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {10}{B}{G}: Monstrosity 10. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each creature with power 4 or greater your opponents control. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put ten +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
trans-unit.target: {10}{B}{G}：蛮化10。对手每操控一个力量等于或大于4的生物，此异能便减少{1}来起动。（如果此生物未蛮化，则在其上放置十个+1/+1指示物且它已蛮化。）

trans-unit.resname: REX·11 | Grim Giganotosaurus | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Grim Giganotosaurus becomes monstrous, destroy all artifacts and creatures other than Grim Giganotosaurus.
trans-unit.target: 当阴森南巨龙蛮化时，消灭阴森南巨龙以外的所有神器和生物。

trans-unit.resname: REX·12 | Henry Wu, InGen Geneticist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Henry Wu, InGen Geneticist
trans-unit.target: 基因科技遗传学家吴亨利

trans-unit.resname: REX·12 | Henry Wu, InGen Geneticist | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Henry Wu, InGen Geneticist and other Human creatures you control have exploit. (When a creature with exploit enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
trans-unit.target: 基因科技遗传学家吴亨利和由你操控的其他人类生物具有榨取异能。（当具榨取异能的生物进战场时，你可以牺牲一个生物。）

trans-unit.resname: REX·12 | Henry Wu, InGen Geneticist | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control exploits a non-Human creature, draw a card. If the exploited creature had power 3 or greater, create a Treasure token.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物榨取一个非人类生物时，抓一张牌。如果所榨取的生物力量等于或大于3，则派出一个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: REX·13 | Ian Malcolm, Chaotician | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ian Malcolm, Chaotician
trans-unit.target: 混沌学家伊恩·马科姆

trans-unit.resname: REX·13 | Ian Malcolm, Chaotician | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player draws their second card each turn, that player exiles the top card of their library.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手抓每回合中其第二张牌时，该牌手放逐其牌库顶牌。

trans-unit.resname: REX·13 | Ian Malcolm, Chaotician | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: During each player's turn, that player may cast a spell from among the cards they don't own exiled with Ian Malcolm, Chaotician, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.
trans-unit.target: 于每位牌手的回合中，该牌手可以从以混沌学家伊恩·马科姆放逐、且不由其拥有的牌之中施放一个咒语，且能用任意种类的法术力来施放之。

trans-unit.resname: REX·13 | Ian Malcolm, Chaotician | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You've heard of chaos theory?"
trans-unit.target: 「你们听过混沌理论吗？」

trans-unit.resname: REX·14 | Indominus Rex, Alpha | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Indominus Rex, Alpha
trans-unit.target: 恐龙之首暴虐霸王龙

trans-unit.resname: REX·14 | Indominus Rex, Alpha | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As Indominus Rex, Alpha enters the battlefield, discard any number of creature cards. It enters with a flying counter on it if a card discarded this way has flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, hexproof, haste, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 于恐龙之首暴虐霸王龙进战场时，弃任意数量的生物牌。如果某张以此法弃掉的牌具有飞行异能，则它进战场时上面有一个飞行指示物。且先攻、连击、死触、辟邪、敏捷、不灭、系命、威慑、延势、践踏与警戒异能亦比照办理。

trans-unit.resname: REX·14 | Indominus Rex, Alpha | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Indominus Rex enters the battlefield, draw a card for each counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 当暴虐霸王龙进战场时，其上每有一个指示物，便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: REX·15 | Indoraptor, the Perfect Hybrid | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Indoraptor, the Perfect Hybrid
trans-unit.target: 完美混种暴虐迅猛龙

trans-unit.resname: REX·15 | Indoraptor, the Perfect Hybrid | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Bloodthirst X (This creature enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the damage dealt to your opponents this turn.)
trans-unit.target: 嗜血X（此生物进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物，X为对手本回合受过的伤害数量。）

trans-unit.resname: REX·15 | Indoraptor, the Perfect Hybrid | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Menace
trans-unit.target: 威慑

trans-unit.resname: REX·15 | Indoraptor, the Perfect Hybrid | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Enrage — Whenever Indoraptor, the Perfect Hybrid is dealt damage, choose an opponent at random. Indoraptor deals damage equal to its power to that player unless they sacrifice a nontoken creature.
trans-unit.target: 激怒～每当完美混种暴虐迅猛龙受到伤害时，随机选择一位对手。除非该牌手牺牲一个非衍生物的生物，否则暴虐迅猛龙对该牌手造成等同于其力量的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: REX·16 | Owen Grady, Raptor Trainer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Owen Grady, Raptor Trainer
trans-unit.target: 迅猛龙驯师欧文·格雷迪

trans-unit.resname: REX·16 | Owen Grady, Raptor Trainer | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Partner with Blue, Loyal Raptor
trans-unit.target: 与忠诚迅猛龙布鲁拍档

trans-unit.resname: REX·16 | Owen Grady, Raptor Trainer | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Put your choice of a menace, trample, reach, or haste counter on target Dinosaur. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {T}：在目标恐龙上依你的选择放置一个威慑，践踏，延势或敏捷指示物。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: REX·16 | Owen Grady, Raptor Trainer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I don't control the raptors. It's a relationship. It's based on mutual respect."
trans-unit.target: 「我不控制迅猛龙，我和它们建立关系。我们互相尊重。」

trans-unit.source: Permission Denied
trans-unit.target: 权限遭拒

trans-unit.source: Counter target noncreature spell. Your opponents can't cast noncreature spells this turn.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标非生物咒语。所有对手本回合都不能施放非生物咒语。

trans-unit.source: "Ah, ah, ah! You didn't say the magic word."
trans-unit.target: 「啊，啊，啊！你没念开门咒。」

trans-unit.source: Ravenous Tyrannosaurus
trans-unit.target: 血口霸王龙

trans-unit.resname: REX·18 | Ravenous Tyrannosaurus | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Devour 3 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with three times that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
trans-unit.target: 吞噬3（于它进战场时，你可以牺牲任意数量的生物。此生物进战场时上面有该数量三倍的+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: REX·18 | Ravenous Tyrannosaurus | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Ravenous Tyrannosaurus attacks, it deals damage equal to its power to up to one other target creature. Excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.
trans-unit.target: 每当血口霸王龙攻击时，它对至多另一个目标生物造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。过量伤害改为对该生物的操控者造成之。

trans-unit.source: Swooping Pteranodon
trans-unit.target: 扑袭无齿翼龙

trans-unit.resname: REX·19 | Swooping Pteranodon | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, haste
trans-unit.target: 飞行，敏捷

trans-unit.resname: REX·19 | Swooping Pteranodon | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Swooping Pteranodon or another Dinosaur with flying enters the battlefield under your control, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains flying and haste until end of turn. At the beginning of the next end step, target land deals 3 damage to that creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当扑袭无齿翼龙或另一个具飞行异能的恐龙在你操控下进战场时，获得目标由对手操控之生物的操控权直到回合结束。重置该生物。它获得飞行与敏捷异能直到回合结束。在下一个结束步骤开始时，目标地对该生物造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Dino DNA
trans-unit.target: 恐龙基因

trans-unit.resname: REX·20 | Dino DNA | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Imprint — {1}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: 压印～{1}，{T}：将目标生物牌从坟墓场放逐。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: REX·20 | Dino DNA | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {6}: Create a token that's a copy of target creature card exiled with Dino DNA, except it's a 6/6 green Dinosaur creature with trample. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {6}：派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为目标以恐龙基因放逐之牌的复制品，但它是6/6绿色，具践踏异能的恐龙生物。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.source: "Dinosaurs left their blueprints behind for us."\n—Mr. DNA
trans-unit.target: 「恐龙也留下了它们的蓝图，待我们去寻找。」 ～DNA先生

trans-unit.source: Plains
trans-unit.target: 平原

trans-unit.source: Plains
trans-unit.target: 平原

trans-unit.source: Island
trans-unit.target: 海岛

trans-unit.source: Island
trans-unit.target: 海岛

trans-unit.source: Swamp
trans-unit.target: 沼泽

trans-unit.source: Swamp
trans-unit.target: 沼泽

trans-unit.source: Mountain
trans-unit.target: 山脉

trans-unit.source: Mountain
trans-unit.target: 山脉

trans-unit.source: Forest
trans-unit.target: 树林

trans-unit.source: Forest
trans-unit.target: 树林

trans-unit.source: Command Tower
trans-unit.target: 指挥塔

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为你指挥官标识色中的任意颜色。

trans-unit.source: "Corporate felt genetic modification would up the 'wow' factor."\n—Claire Dearing
trans-unit.target: 「公司觉得基因改造后会更『劲爆』。」 ～克莱尔·迪林

trans-unit.source: Command Tower
trans-unit.target: 指挥塔

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为你指挥官标识色中的任意颜色。

trans-unit.source: "They're dinosaurs. 'Wow' enough."\n—Owen Grady
trans-unit.target: 「它们是恐龙。已经够『劲爆』了。」 ～欧文·格雷迪

trans-unit.source: Destroy all tapped creatures. Until your next turn, whenever a creature becomes tapped, destroy it.
"Keep absolutely still. Its vision is based on movement."\n—Alan Grant

It preyed on anything it could sink its teeth into.

trans-unit.resname: REX·31 | Life Finds a Way | Card Text

trans-unit.source: "Life breaks free. It expands to new territories and crashes through barriers. Painfully, maybe even dangerously. But, uh, well there it is."\n—Ian Malcolm

"Well... it's a superpredator."\n—Billy Brennan

trans-unit.resname: REX·33 | Blue, Loyal Raptor | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Partner with Owen Grady, Raptor Trainer (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Owen into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) For each kind of counter on Blue, Loyal Raptor, each other Dinosaur you control enters the battlefield with a counter of that kind on it.
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, create a tapped token that's a copy of Compy Swarm.
"There's no reason for it to fear man."\n—Robert Burke

trans-unit.resname: REX·35 | Ellie and Alan, Paleontologists | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Discover X, where X is the mana value of the exiled card. Activate only as a sorcery. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with that mana value or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

{10}{B}{G}: Monstrosity 10. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each creature with power 4 or greater your opponents control. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put ten +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Grim Giganotosaurus becomes monstrous, destroy all artifacts and creatures other than Grim Giganotosaurus.

trans-unit.resname: REX·37 | Henry Wu, InGen Geneticist | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Henry Wu, InGen Geneticist and other Human creatures you control have exploit. (When a creature with exploit enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.) Whenever a creature you control exploits a non-Human creature, draw a card. If the exploited creature had power 3 or greater, create a Treasure token.

trans-unit.resname: REX·38 | Ian Malcolm, Chaotician | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player draws their second card each turn, that player exiles the top card of their library. During each player's turn, that player may cast a spell from among the cards they don't own exiled with Ian Malcolm, Chaotician, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.

trans-unit.resname: REX·38 | Ian Malcolm, Chaotician | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You've heard of chaos theory?"

trans-unit.resname: REX·39 | Indominus Rex, Alpha | Card Text
trans-unit.source: As Indominus Rex, Alpha enters the battlefield, discard any number of creature cards. It enters with a flying counter on it if a card discarded this way has flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, hexproof, haste, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance. When Indominus Rex enters the battlefield, draw a card for each counter on it.

trans-unit.resname: REX·40 | Indoraptor, the Perfect Hybrid | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Bloodthirst X (This creature enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the damage dealt to your opponents this turn.) Menace Enrage — Whenever Indoraptor, the Perfect Hybrid is dealt damage, choose an opponent at random. Indoraptor deals damage equal to its power to that player unless they sacrifice a nontoken creature.

trans-unit.resname: REX·41 | Owen Grady, Raptor Trainer | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Partner with Blue, Loyal Raptor {T}: Put your choice of a menace, trample, reach, or haste counter on target Dinosaur. Activate only as a sorcery.

trans-unit.resname: REX·41 | Owen Grady, Raptor Trainer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I don't control the raptors. It's a relationship. It's based on mutual respect."
Counter target noncreature spell. Your opponents can't cast noncreature spells this turn.
"Ah, ah, ah! You didn't say the magic word."

Devour 3 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with three times that many +1/+1 counters on it.) Whenever Ravenous Tyrannosaurus attacks, it deals damage equal to its power to up to one other target creature. Excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.

Flying, haste Whenever Swooping Pteranodon or another Dinosaur with flying enters the battlefield under your control, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains flying and haste until end of turn. At the beginning of the next end step, target land deals 3 damage to that creature.

Imprint — {1}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Activate only as a sorcery. {6}: Create a token that's a copy of target creature card exiled with Dino DNA, except it's a 6/6 green Dinosaur creature with trample. Activate only as a sorcery.
"Dinosaurs left their blueprints behind for us."\n—Mr. DNA
